给想入手的中国同胞提醒几点：
1.这游戏目前没有国服，也就是说你会被匹配到其他国家的服务器，延迟高，对国人发挥有影响，建议挂加速器，免费的话推荐奇妙加速器。
2.你会和其他国家的人玩游戏，他们可能会歧视你，所以建议不取中文id，资料保密。如果你选择明示你是中国人，记住别丢国人脸。
3.游戏做的不错，缺点就是有bug、挂哥和阴间制作组。
4.游戏较暗，建议用N卡把亮度和曝光率调高。
5.操作连续下饭、对手嘲讽、赛后嘲讽和‘‘捷报’’频传可能导致高血压（尤其是屠夫玩家）。
6.心态放平，别学人家动不动就拔线。
7.游戏可能卡输入法，建议在游戏时调成英文输入法或者用‘’游戏加加‘’等软件。
8.使用耳机可以听声辨位，提升游戏体验。
9.你的对手是和你一样的逗比玩家，不要有心理压力（不会有人觉得这是个恐怖游戏吧）。
10.这游戏有点技巧，建议去B站多看多学。

Edited: 12/29/21
Continues to be rampant in the amount of cheaters within the game. MMR is still trash. Better off uninstalling this game and installing a single player game.

Still a trash game. Delete MMR it does nothing to improve game play. It promotes toxic game play from both sides.

I am writing this review today to warn any soul who is interested in this game. 

For some background I have played since beta. I have played both sides equally with my stronger being killer. I have had many fun moments in this game. But as the years went on it was less and less. I have taken about a year break between 2018-2019. The game again is in a state where I do not wish to support nor want to torment myself no more.

Ever since they have implemented MMR (Match Making Rating) it has turned to the worse. This MMR is based upon whether you survive or die as a survivor or for killer you are considered to be in 4 separate matches and if you kill a survivor you increase your MMR or if they escape your MMR decreases.

MMR functions terribly. You are forced to go into every game as killer and chase a survivor around a circle for a certain amount of time while the other survivors are busy doing generators. By the time you get the survivor down already 1-2 maybe even 3 gens have popped. 

This is what high MMR game play is like. It is highly survivor skewed it is not even funny. The maps have all safe loops no matter where the survivor runs to.

Do NOT get this game if you want to have fun. The game itself can be terribly addicting and the grind is not new player friendly. 

I for one have uninstalled the game and hope the developers will implement a change which will make the game fun again.
(Create dead zones, give survivors other tasks, get rid of MMR or implement a whole separate mode.)

Overall: DO NOT GET THIS GAME

Last time I played, finding a match took about 10 years and when we finally got in, the killer disconnected. Playing as survivor is either really fun or hella boring. Most of the time half the match is holding down a button on a generator. Getting chased is actually really fun but if u dont know how to play around the killer then u can die really quick and its not fun. Also if u solo q then your teammates will always have the combined iq of a preschooler. Playing killer is much more consistent but survivors playing together can almost never lose. I find this game extremely inconsistent because some games can be so damn fun, but the other half is just mindlessly fixing a generator or boring chases. I remember playing this game for the first time with friends and it was so damn fun because we all had to work together while being super scared of the killer. After u play it for some time tho its not scary anymore so it loses that element. Also, half the maps are so dogshit. Some are extremely tilted in one sides favor as well. For example, the new map for the meat plant has about 69 million god pallets that the killer cannot play around whatsoever. I hit the top rank in this game but it does not matter at all, and honestly it just increases the queue time u have to sit ur dumbass in. Lots of people are addicted to this game and thats the only reason they play it, but they will always complain when they actually play the game. If u buy this game then enjoy the first few hours with friends and maybe try to get better for a bit, but I wouldnt expect anyone to enjoy this game for long periods of time unless they become addicted to it. Oni and nurse are the most fun killers and meg and bill have the best survivor perks. Claudette is literally the best survivor because shes black and her skin blends in with the dark. If u play freddy ur a bitch. Also i want the huntress to chop my balls off with her hatchet
